trans-unit.source: The information you entered was saved successfully.
trans-unit.target: Informacija koju ste uneli je uspešno sačuvana.

trans-unit.source: Your company information was saved successfully. It will be added to getlokal after it has been approved by an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Informacije o Vašoj kompaniji su uspešno sačuvane i biće objavljene nakon odobrenja od strane administratora.

trans-unit.source: Your username should contain only alphanumeric characters, dash, dot or underscore
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime može sadržati samo alfanumeričke karaktere, srednju crtu, donju crtu i tačku. Razmak između karaktera ne može da postoji.

trans-unit.source: The email and/or password are invalid
Policy for Use and Protection of the Information of Getlokal
trans-unit.target: Polisa zaštite privatnosti podataka na Getlokal

trans-unit.source: Your review was not published successfully.
The offer was not saved. Please fill in all mandatory fields.
trans-unit.target: Ponuda nije sačuvana. Molimo popunite obavezna polja.

trans-unit.source: The profile picture was changed successfully.
[0]No uploaded photos yet.|[1]1 uploaded photo|(1,+Inf]%count% uploaded photos
trans-unit.target: [0]Još uvek nema postavljenih fotografija.|[1]1 objavljena slika|(1,+Inf]Broj objavljenih fotografija: %count%

trans-unit.source: Your account changes were successfully saved.
trans-unit.target: Promene na nalogu su uspešno sačuvane.

trans-unit.source: The classification information was saved successfully.
trans-unit.target: Informacije o delatnosti su uspešno sačuvane.

trans-unit.source: The detailed description was activated successfully.
The offer title and description (terms) are mandatory for at least one of the two language versions.
trans-unit.target: Naslov i opis (uslovi) Akcije su obavezni za najmanje jednu od dve jezičke verzije.

trans-unit.source: We were unable to send a confirmation request to the email address that you provided. Please check the email you provided is correct.
trans-unit.target: Nismo bili u mogućnosti da pošaljemo potvrdu zahteva na email adresu koju ste dali. Molimo proverite tačnost email adrese koju ste uneli.

trans-unit.source: Your account has been activated. You can now log in using the email and password you provided at registration time.
trans-unit.target: Vaš nalog je aktiviran. Možete se prijaviti korišćenjem email adrese i lozinke koju ste uneli pri registraciji.

trans-unit.source: The new password was sent successfully to the email you provided.
trans-unit.target: Nova lozinka je uspešno poslata na email adresu koju ste uneli

trans-unit.source: We were unable to process your request. Place administration process failed.
trans-unit.target: Nismo mogli da ispoštujemo zahtev. Zahtev za administraciju mesta nije uspeo.

trans-unit.source: Do you engage with your customers?
trans-unit.target: Da li je tvoja firma u kontaktu sa svojim klijentima?

trans-unit.source: Please write clearly, without using offensive or obscene language.
trans-unit.target: Molimo pišite iskreno, bez uvredljivih reči.
Vaš zahtev za preuzimanje profila je prihvaćen!

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your claim request!
trans-unit.target: Hvala što ste poslali zahtev za preuzimanje profila!

trans-unit.source: Your claim request was submitted and will be approved by an administrator. Once you have been approved, you will be able to manage the information about this company.
trans-unit.target: Vaš zahtev za preuzimanje profila je prihvaćen i biće odobren od strane administratora. Kada bude odobren, moći ćete uređivati informacije o ovoj firmi.

trans-unit.source: The event picture was changed successfully.
Your review about %s was changed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Vaša preporuka za %s je uspešno promenjana.

trans-unit.source: There is no registered profile with this email address
trans-unit.target: Nema registrovanih profila sa ovom email adresom

trans-unit.source: The place details were saved successfully.
trans-unit.target: Detalji u vezi mesta su uspešno sačuvani.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations! Thank you for adding a place!
trans-unit.target: Čestitamo! Hvala što ste upisali novo mesto!

trans-unit.source: The email message was not sent successfully.
We encountered problem activating your account.
trans-unit.target: Naišli smo na problem pri aktivaciji vašeg naloga.

trans-unit.source: If you wish us to send you again your activation mail,
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko želite da Vam ponovo pošaljemo aktivacioni mail,

trans-unit.source: The username was sent successfully to your email.
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime je uspešno poslato na vaš email.

trans-unit.source: I agree with the %s and the %s
I have the necessary representative powers and agree with the %s and the %s
trans-unit.target: Imam sva potrebna ovlašćenja i slažem se sa %s i %s

trans-unit.source: In order to protect the information associated with your business we have introduced some additional security requirements.
trans-unit.target: U cilju zaštite informacija u vezi Vaše firme uveli smo dodatne sigurnosne mere.

trans-unit.source: Create a username and password for each of the places you manage and keep this information secure.
trans-unit.target: Kreirajte korisničko ime i lozinku za svako od mesta/firme koje vodite i čuvajte ovu informaciju na sigurnom.

trans-unit.source: Use these login details every time you want to view or edit the information about the places you manage.
trans-unit.target: Koristite ove detalje za prijavu svaki put kada želite da ažurirate informacije o mestu/firmi koju vodite.

trans-unit.source: In my capacity as parent/trustee I hereby declare that I agree with the %s and the %s
trans-unit.target: U svojstvu staratelja izjavljujem saglasnost sa %s i sa %s

trans-unit.source: If you are underage person, your parent/trustee must also declare his/her consent below
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko ste maloletni, vaš roditelj ili staratelj mora takođe odobriti pristanak

trans-unit.source: There is no profile with this username
trans-unit.target: Ne postoji profil sa ovim korisničkim imenom

trans-unit.source: An error ocurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do greške prilikom obrade zahteva. Molimo pokušajte ponovo kasnije.

trans-unit.source: You get interesting information about all the places and events near you
trans-unit.target: Možeš dobiti zanimljive informacije o mestima i događajima u tvojoj blizini

trans-unit.source: You have the opportunity to win fab prizes by participating in getlokal promotions
trans-unit.target: Imaš priliku da osvojiš fantastične nagrade na Getlokal promocijama

trans-unit.source: If you want to leave the getlokal community, all of your reviews, photos, events and lists will be deleted!
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko želite da napustite getlokal zajednicu, sve vaše preporuke, fotografije, događaje i liste biće izbrisane!

trans-unit.source: Proceed to deletion of your getlokal account
Here are three good reasons to keep your account:
trans-unit.target: Ovo su tri dobra razloga da zardžiš svoj nalog:

trans-unit.source: Still want to delete your profile?
trans-unit.target: I dalje želite da obrišete svoj nalog?

trans-unit.source: We are sorry to see you go. We value all our users and would be grateful if you %s and let us know what we did wrong.
trans-unit.target: Žao nam je što odlazite. Poštujemo sve naše korisnike i voleli bismo da %s i date nam do znanja šta smo uradili pogrešno.

trans-unit.source: I agree to the %s and the %s
Policy for Use and Protection of the Information on the Getlokal Website
trans-unit.target: Polisa Korišćenja i Zaštite informacija na sajtu Getlokal

trans-unit.source: I have the necessary representative powers and I agree to the %s and the %s
trans-unit.target: Posedujem obavezna ovlašćenja i slažem se sa %s i sa %s

trans-unit.source: The place you suggested was added to getlokal. It will be checked by a member of the getlokal team to ensure we have the right details and you will receive a confirmation email once it has been verified.
trans-unit.target: Mesto/firma koju ste predložili je dodata na getlokal. Član getlokal tima će je proveriti kako bi se uverio da ste uneli sve tačne detalje pa ćete dobiti potvrdu putem emaila.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add %s, please log into your getlokal profile.
trans-unit.target: Ako želiš da dodaš %s moraš da se uloguješ.

trans-unit.source: You need to log in with a user profile and not as a place admin in order to finish what you started.
trans-unit.target: Morate se prijaviti preko korisničkog naloga a ne kao administrator mesta/firme kako biste završili započeto.

trans-unit.source: We couldn't find a place beginning with:
trans-unit.target: Nismo pronašli mesto/firmu koja počinje sa:

trans-unit.source: Sorry, the place you were looking for does no longer exist at this web address.
trans-unit.target: Mesto/firma kojeu ste tražili više ne postoji na ovoj adresi.

trans-unit.source: You might find similar places if you browse through the places listed in getlokal!
trans-unit.target: Možete pronaći slična mesta/firme na getlokal

trans-unit.source: On getlokal you can read recommendations written by people like you and write your own which will help you take more informed decisions! You can also make lists with useful places, add photos of places and win prizes in our campaigns!
trans-unit.target: Na getlokalu možete pročitati preporuke, pisane od strane ljudi poput Vas, i pisati svoje preporuke koje će Vam pomoći da uz više infomacija donosite odluke! Takođe, možete napraviti liste s korisnim mestima, dodavati fotografije mesta/firmi i osvojiti nagrade u našim kampanjama!

trans-unit.source: [0]No uploaded cover photos yet.|[1]1 uploaded cover photo|(1,+Inf]%count% uploaded cover photos
trans-unit.target: [0]Nije postavljena fotografija.|[1]1 postavljena fotografija|(1,+Inf]%count% postavljene fotografije

trans-unit.source: You need to select a crop area in your image.
[0]No users or places being followed.|[1]1 followed.|(1,+Inf]%count% followed
trans-unit.target: [0]Nema korisnika ni mesta/firme koji se prate.|[1]1 se prati|(1,+Inf]Broj korisnika i mesta koje pratim: %count%

trans-unit.source: Thank you for registering with getlokal!
You are already an administrator for this place and cannot write reviews for it but only reply to reviews by other users about your place.
trans-unit.target: Kao administrator ovog mesta ne možete pisati preporuke za njega već samo odgovarati na preporuke drugih korisnika.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your review?
trans-unit.target: Sigurno želiš da izbrišeš svoju preporuku?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your article?
trans-unit.target: Sigurno želiš da izbrišeš ovaj članak?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your list?
trans-unit.target: Sigurno želiš da izbrišeš ovu listu?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete your event?
trans-unit.target: Sigurno želiš da izbrišeš ovaj događaj?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete the current file?
trans-unit.target: Dali sigurno želis da izbrišeš postojeći fajl?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to approve
Are you sure you want to reject
Are you sure you want to deactivate
If you just want to grab this place details and show them on your blog or site, just customise the settings below and paste the code in your source file.
trans-unit.target: Ako želiš da preuzmeš detalje ovog profila i prikažeš ih na svom sajtu ili blogu, podesi parametre i kopiraj kod u svoj sors fajl.

trans-unit.source: Do you run a events related blog or website? You can take-away some fresh content from getlokal. Just customize the looks and content, grab the code and paste it in the source code where you want it to show.
trans-unit.target: Ako imaš sajt ili blog koji se bavi događajima i želiš da ga obogatiš sadržajem, možeš ga preuzeti sa našeg sajta. Podesi parametre, izgled i sadržaj koji želiš da preuzimaš i kopiraj kod u svoj sors fajl.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all mandatory fields.
The current file has been successfully deleted.

trans-unit.target: Pronađi ono što tražiš još lakše,

trans-unit.source: You made some changes. What do you want to do with them?
trans-unit.target: Da li želiš da sačuvaš izmene?

trans-unit.source: Thank you for sending your reservation request. Getlokal will forward it to the relevant person and they will be in touch with you shortly.
trans-unit.target: Hvala. Zahtev za rezervaciju je poslat. Getlokal će je proslediti nadležnom licu tako da ćeš uskoro dobiti povratnu informaciju o rezervaciji.

trans-unit.source: Log in/Register to link the places you added with your account!
trans-unit.target: Uloguj se/registruj se i poveži dodata mesta/firme sa svojim profilom!

trans-unit.source: Thank you! If the place is claimed, we will sent your suggestions to the owner. If not, we will manually verify and update the details of the place.
trans-unit.target: Hvala! Ako je profil preuzet od strane vlasnika, poslaćemo mu predložene izmene. Ako nije, administratori će proveriti informacije i objaviti izmene.

trans-unit.source: Scan this code with your smartphone
Planning a great night out looking for a recommended beauty salon, or a trendy bar - you will find everything you search in Getlokal
trans-unit.target: Planiraš izlazak i dobar provod, tražiš preporučeni salon lepote ili popularni kafe bar - sve što tražiš pronaći ćeš na Getlokal

trans-unit.source: Concerts, exhibitions, parties – Getlokal will show you when and where local events are happening
trans-unit.target: Koncerti, izložbe, žurke - Getlokal će te obavestiti gde i kad se održavaju lokalni događaji

trans-unit.source: If you want to search again for another location, please use the 'Where' field to enter the right location. It is also possible to expand your search to cover the whole of %s
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko želite da tražite ponovo za novu lokaciju, molimo da koristite polje 'gde' kako biste uneli tačnu lokaciju. Možete i proširiti pretragu kako biste pokrili celu %s

trans-unit.source: Couldn't find the place you were looking for? %s and we'll add it.
trans-unit.target: Niste pronašli mesto/firmu koje ste tražili? %s i dodajte.
